backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend with access-controlled user profiles, district/village CRUD operations (admin-only writes, public reads), and blob storage/authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a bug where the `addDistrict` mutation fails in the Admin Panel Villages tab, listing the relevant frontend files and components to investigate.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, styling palette, and key functionality for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, destructive, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Hindi language attribute, Google Fonts imports for Noto Serif/Sans Devanagari and Cinzel, and SEO meta description for the foundation site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with hash-based routing that renders AdminPanel at `#/admin` and the full homepage section stack (Hero through Footer) for all other routes.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component rendering mission/vision cards, foundation history, and an 11-item core values grid with lucide-react icons using the maroon/gold OKLCH palette.
frontend/src/components/ActivitiesSectio: Activities section that fetches and displays activity cards with images and dates via React Query, seeds initial data on mount, and shows zeroed-out impact statistics.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel component with Internet Identity authentication, passcode protection, and tabs for managing districts and villages (add/delete) via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AssistanceSectio: A Hindi-language assistance request form section that validates and submits name, mobile number, city, and assistance type using the useAddAssistanceRequest mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying foundation address, phone, email, and social links fetched from the backend, alongside a contact inquiry form with validation.
Donation section showing UPI QR code, bank details with copy buttons, preset amount selection, and a donor registration form that submits via the useAddDonation mutation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with foundation branding, quick navigation links, a Quranic quote, and a copyright bar with a gradient top border.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery section rendering a static 6-item grid of foundation event images with hover overlay captions and fallback handling for missing images.
frontend/src/components/GovernmentScheme: Renders a grid of cards showcasing six Indian government welfare schemes (e.g., PM Awas Yojana, Ayushman Bharat) with Hindi descriptions, eligibility info, and color-coded icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with the foundation logo, Hindi nav links, smooth-scroll handling, mobile hamburger menu, and a search icon that opens the SearchBar overlay.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-width hero banner with a background image, dark overlay, foundation name in Hindi/English, a 'since 2011' badge, and CTA buttons for donation and about sections.
frontend/src/components/MembershipSectio: Membership registration form with text fields (name, mobile, email, city, Aadhaar) and file upload fields for address/identity proof, submitting data via the useAddMembership hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Modal search overlay that filters predefined site sections by Hindi/English keywords and scrolls to the selected section on selection.
Accordion-style section listing districts fetched from the backend, each expandable to show associated village chips loaded via useGetVillagesByDistrict.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (activities, donations, memberships, assistance requests, contact inquiries, foundation info), currently stubbed as no-ops after a backend migration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines a maroon/Islamic color palette via CSS custom properties for light and dark modes, and applies custom component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with a maroon/red/gold/cream color palette using OKLCH values, custom font families for Devanagari and display text, and CSS variable-based semantic color tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 27) for the Gausiya Ashrafia Foundation charitable society app, including architectural notes, color palette, known issues, and a list of existing features with their IDs and versions.
